testcase.name: 1 check User Role Column
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed When clicks on login page...................................................passed When user clicks on Go To Admin.............................................passed And user clicks on user management..........................................passed And user clicks on Users....................................................passed Then Verify User Role Column................................................passed Then Logout and Close Browsers..............................................passed

testcase.name: 2 check Employee Name Column
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed When clicks on login page...................................................passed When user clicks on Go To Leave.............................................passed And user clicks on My Leave.................................................passed Then Verify Employee Name Column............................................passed Then Logout and Close Browser...............................................passed
